name: Sling, Sling Swamp
description:
CHANGE LOG:

- Fixed game-breaking bug that rendered latter half of level inaccessible

- Adjusted tongue speed

HOW TO PLAY:

Your swamp has been contaminated with hazardous nuclear waste! You must escape your dangerous habitat using your newfound tongue-grappling power! Just be careful not to fall in! 

CONTROLS:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Tongue Grapple - Click

Tongue Grapple Cancel - Click while grappling

CREDITS:

Code, Art, SFX - Jamchills

Music (Forest Hopper) - Crossedkiller
